name: AVAudioPlayerNodeCompletionCallbackType
desc: Constants that specify when the framework must invoke the completion handler.

items.name: case dataConsumed
items.desc: A completion handler that indicates the player consumes the buffer or file data.

items.name: case dataRendered
items.desc: A completion handler that indicates the player renders the buffer or file data.

items.name: case dataPlayedBack
items.desc: A completion handler that indicates the player finishes the buffer or file data.
